properties.publicRemarks: Welcome to your dream home in Del Webb Rancho Mirage! This beautifully upgraded spacious ''Journey'' design home is finished in an appealing Spanish-style elevation, and sits on a corner lot near the community clubhouse and offers stunning mountain views. The Journey model features a large owner's suite, which has been elongated for added space. It includes two separate vanity areas and a stylish walk-in shower. Additionally, there is a separate guest suite with its own exterior door, allowing guests to come and go freely. The home boasts numerous upgrades, including high-quality cabinetry, tile flooring, a fireplace and surround, kitchen appliances, and quartz counters. It also features a butler's pantry with a wine fridge, custom blinds, a remodeled powder room, sliding doors, door seals for both garages, and energy-efficient washer/dryer units. Custom cabinetry can also be found in the guest bedroom and garage. Smart home technology allows for remote control of the security system, door locks, thermostats, and pool equipment. The home is equipped with additional Wi-Fi boosters for improved connectivity. The private backyard is designed for relaxation and entertainment, featuring a large covered patio, an outdoor kitchen with a plumbed bar sink and built-in BBQ, as well as a spectacular in-ground saltwater swimming pool and spa, complete with attractive lighting and waterfalls. A custom fire pit is perfect for enjoying starry desert evenings, while low-maintenance landscaping and a section of artificial turf ensure comfort for your pets. The elongated main garage includes a Level-2 electric car charging station, a mini-split air conditioner to keep your vehicles and stored items cool, a tankless water heater, and a Pelican salt-free water filtration and UV treatment system. The home is equipped with 33 OWNED SOLAR PANELS, which are grandfathered into NEM 2.0 metering, significantly reducing electric bills. Del Webb Rancho Mirage is an active 55+ gated community that offers a variety of amenities, including swimming pools, spas, pickleball, tennis courts, putting greens, a fitness center with locker rooms, a bar, a golf simulator, billiards, bocce courts, meeting rooms, a ballroom, an aerobics room, and onsite management. There are numerous social clubs and organized events throughout the year, so there's always something to look forward to! This beautiful home is clean, well-maintained, fully furnished, and ready for you to move in!
